alert.note: Alert for McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 12:41PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western McDonald County through 115 PM CDT... At 1240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Noel, or 10 miles west of Pineville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Noel, Dodge, Goodman, South West City, Lanagan, Cayuga and Tiff City. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 4 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
